label: Books on Sustainable Development Goal 1: Eradication of Extreme Poverty
description: A selection of titles on Sustainable Development Goal 1: Eradication of Extreme Poverty available from the European Parliament Library.

list.label: Attaining the 2030 Sustainable Development Goal of No Poverty.
The Routledge International Handbook of Social Development, Social Work, and the Sustainable Development Goals
Smart Technologies for Sustainable Development Goals: No Poverty
Financial Inclusion and Sustainable Rural Development.
Identity, Territories, and Sustainability : Challenges and Opportunities for Achieving the un Sustainable Development Goals
Policy Capacity, Design and the Sustainable Development Goals : Wicked Problems in Uncertain Environments.
Understanding the Multi-Dimensional Nature of Poverty.
Sustainable Economic Development : Fostering the United Nations Goals
